section.title: Links to other flashcard programs
section.p: The following list is a collection of links to other flashcard programs I am a aware of - and which I think are worth mentioning. Some of them have been an inspiration to DingsBums?!.
If DingsBums?! cannot provide what you are looking for, try one of those. Or tell me what is missing, so I can improve the application!.

ul.li: The Wikipedia entry for flashcard contains a lot of links to both programs and background material.
Memorization Software Reviewed has over 200 software products
The Study Stack has a lot of links to flashcard applications
